text: Choose the faction you want to trade with :
Select at least one region to trade
A mod that adds in a user interface that allows the user to transfer settlements from one ally to another, or force two allies of the same race to confederate together.
Allow trading to and from the player
If enabled, you and your allies can send cities to and from your faction. If disabled, cities can only be traded between your allied factions, not involving your own.

Confederate the giving faction into the receiving faction.\\n[[col:red]]WARNING: This will cause all cities and armies of %s to be annexed by %s. Presing this button will cause %s to cease to exist![[/col]]
